domain.action

Class ActionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.action.ActionFactory

  • public class ActionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains a factory method to handle the complex process of creating IActions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IAction create(IActionRequest request, IReadOnlyBoard board)
      Factory method to create IActions based on a given IActionRequest.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static IAction create(IActionRequest request,
                             IReadOnlyBoard board)
                      throws LocationOutOfRangeException
        Factory method to create IActions based on a given IActionRequest.
        Parameters:
        request - The IActionRequest to create the new IAction from.
        board - The IBoard of the current IGame.
        Throws:
        LocationOutOfRangeException - When the IActionRequest contains invalid indices.
